content: It's just like the website, minus the speed, features, usability and convenience. I don't understand why this even exists. Want to zoom a user photo? That's too damn bad. Want 1 product page open while you look at a 2nd? Sucks to be you. Rather just use the web page again, or use it to view a 2nd product you're considering? Nope! This app will hijack your web browser and force you to use the crippled interface. Want to view product pics? No. None load for some items. Then the app locks up.

I don't want to watch your videos. You have made it so that the app will not scroll if I touch a video. This causes many of these terrible attempts at peddling some outsourced garbage to pop up to full screen, when I don't want it to. This is the sort of poor functionality that will cause me to remove the app, and subsequently my prime subscription. Update: I would also like to be able to filter by country of origin. If that's too much, just have a filter to exclude results from China.

I really like Amazon's service and their logistics are really cool. The app on the other hand needs to narrow filters, there's too many unrelated results that a quick search becomes a half hour task. All those spam results is what prevents me from getting Amazon prime so that I don't fall into buying things I don't really need or that are just risky and low quality. Anyway, kudos to the developers and delivery staff.

Amazon is great, the App is not!! The filter process is absolutely horrible and it shows a lot of irrelevant things. When you send email updates on orders, why can't you mention the item names or include picture of those items in that email body itself that is being referred to in that particular email. That will help a lot. The emails are useless if they dont say what items they are referring to.

Uhh... at some point, it wanted to charge me $60 more on top of the $90 worth of items I was going to purchase. No thanks. App is a little confusing too. Hoping amazon could have set prices for the items being sold instead of the range of numbers like ($20-$45) or says it's $2 but when you click on the product, it turns into $16. Stuff like that.

Can't view recent purchases page. It just keeps refreshing and nothing really loads. I've even tried reinstalling to see if it fixes it, but nope. I thought maybe it was just a bad update, but it's been like this for months now, without a fix. Do better, Amazon. All these other things that don't even matter are on the main page, but we can't even view recent purchases anymore.

Paid for prime tried shopping but Amazon refuses to ship anything I'm in Tampa. Every time I try and order something they never ship it. They will send you notifications like it's on its way then nothing. I have 3 orders canceled for failure to even ship the product. Different vendors Different products same result. Amazon has horrible customer service. All they said was wait longer or shop somewhere else. I'm not exaggerating. I wish I took a screen shot. I don't have a single good thing to say

Idk what happened but it freezes, takes forever to load or let me move pictures to check out items. it's NOT my phone since every other app including Prime TV and Freevee work just fine. Phone has full bars and my wifi is connected full too. I even reloaded the app, restarted my phone, so it the app and not my phone. It makes it difficult to shop and buy especially for Christmas.

Issues since the 11/25/22 Update. Now when I attempt to go to view my Past Orders. It takes me to the screen loads the in app links but the orders never load and the load bar just rapidly flashes. I have to close the app completely to remedy the issue. This happens everytime I attempt to view previous orders. Friends and family have spoken of the same issue since the last update. Lastly and extremely annoying. Now when you search for an item. The Videos and even ads start automatically!

I haven't had nearly the same trouble with bugs as some people are having, but I still see the "There was an error on our end" page way too much. My main inconvenience is ordering things that boast, (Buy in this amount of time to get it tomorrow) and 3 days later, I'm alerted that it was just shipped. I don't even know if Amazon is to blame, but police your sellers or something. Prime isn't worth paying for if it has no advantages over using the free version.

App has become the worst version of itself that I've ever experienced. Always crashing and lagging, product videos will go to black screen and never play. Cart button goes to a product and not cart. Lots of issues. I'm not going to write a book about them. My experience with Amazon Shopping has become labored and tedious. I sincerely hope they get things back to before the newest update.

When it works, it works, but I have to give it 2 stars because it periodically needs to be uninstalled and reinstalled to work properly. One day, I'll open the app and all my data is gone, wish list, history, gift card balance, etc. I can see that stuff fine if I log in using my PC, but that defeats the purpose of having the app. The only way to get it to work properly again is to reinstall it to finally retrieve my data. And it's issue with multiple devices (Tab S2, Tab S3, Pixel 3a).

The ONE thing tech companies are supposed to be laser focused on is getting people to buy stuff. Amazon can't even get that right. Someone sent me a direct Amazon product link, and even though the app is supposed to handle a.co URLs, it wouldn't open the one I got. Searching for the product by its exact ID, which has always worked in a browser, shows me a full screen of ads for other products, with repeated popups encouraging me to ask Alexa random mundane questions. Just let me spend my money!

***UPDATE*** I did almost all of my Christmas üéÑ shopping on this app and I was mostly presently surprised. Orderimg was great. Tracking was great. One of the few concerns I had was i had to keep checking the shipping addresses each package was supposed to be shipped to because it kept changing and I didn't like that. Based on reviews, I regretfully will not be installing this app until improvements are made. It's unfortunate because I have some serious shopping to do!

The app is way too sensitive to taps. Half the time when I'm just trying to scroll it'll mistake a swipe for a tap and take me to a page I never wanted to view. Also constantly creeped out by the "shopping livestreams" section and wish I could turn it off, or at least not have it autoplay. Some of us are on limited data plans, don't waste it on video streams without my permission.

I love using Amazon for Prime and other things but give me a break go and order some actually well designed app, because the one you have right now looks like it was partaking in middle school design contest, it uncomfortable, hard to read, everything is a messy, there's nothing about intuition. Searching for anything is a hassle, while searching for something you can get results of a totally different products, make categories, advanced search filters. Even consumer profile isn't intuitive....

So the filter options are confusing and don't give you the options you want. Used to have a filter price high to low but can't find it anywhere. The way they bill and display orders is for their convenience not the customers. If I buy 100$ worth of stuff i don't want to see it as 10 separate purchases. Just show me the 1 order I placed and within the order show the 10 items not 10 separate charges and orders.

The app has become increasingly annoying because of the ridiculous "BUY MORE!!" features. Not only does it intrusively suggest Users Also Bought popups as soon as I select something, it has also started sending asinine promos in my notifications bar. Amazon, I REALLY DGAF if there's a game, show, etc. I'm on the verge of using your competitors. Please give users the option to opt out of all these extra features. I want to be notified when a package arrives. NOTHING ELSE!!

App constantly buffering. Not just once in awhile when a lot of people may be using it, but every time I use it. I can NEVER check my orders cause that page will never load. Other setting options take forever to load as well. The only part that seems to work is the shopping portion of the app. Will take my money but won't let me check on my order.

Can't contact CS agents unless you download the app. It's ridiculous. They make it incredibly hard to contact anyone so you only do the set computerized options. Also absolutely despise how they ship and process orders. They'll ship your items individually and charge after each one ships instead of just charging once - you know when you make the order. Not even an option to select "only send one package i understand the wait might be longer"

Items said order within 4 hours and receive it in two days. I wait 30 minutes to place the order and it changes to 6 day delivery. So I thought maybe the item was just out of stock or something. Nope. Every single item on all of Amazon was 6 days or more delivery! Thats Amazon prime and sold and shipped through Amazon. Customer service was a joke. The first one said it was a technical error and fixed it. As soon as the chat ended it went back to 6 day shipping. Error was never fixed.

App freezing, crashing, lagging, you name it, it's f****d. Never had any problems until they switched to this green bs for the Holidays or whatever tf they've changed it for. It used to be easy to make purchases, edit them if need be, etc. I have been trying for days to make a purchase and am getting a "Payment revision needed" promt. There is nothing wrong with my card, I've used it at other places this whole time without issue. They have made it playing hell trying to use their business.

Do not save your card on app!!!! Every single time I make a purchase it wants me to save the card and occasionally I forget to remove it. When I forget the card on app suddenly I start getting fake Amazon account messages and it wasn't until yesterday that I got a "digital charge" for $5 on my card. When I check my digital and even regular orders there's nothing to show for it. SCAMMERS PARADISE!!! Customer service claims it's not them and refuse to help.

It was ok but this recent update ruined the experience. The app always used excessive data but now it is terrible. Somehow browsing for 10 minutes uses more data than watching a 10+ minute video on YouTube. Since this update the app is extremely laggy and even heats my phone up which it never did. Not only that but sometimes pages don't even load or when they eventually do they are missing half the stuff requiring me to go to the previous page and try again. There's plenty more wrong.....

I never leave reviews on anything, but this needs it. Their customer service is extremely hard to find, and when you do find it, it can take some time to get to an associate instead of the robot. Amazon charged me over $100 extra in the span of a month, but that's more about the company than the app itself. They also sometimes try to slip Prime into your checkout, so make sure you remove it if you don't want it.

Abysmal Performance. Past orders are unbearably slow to load, as is using the Whole Foods delivery functionality. Also, I've had issues with 1/3 of my orders this year- a lot, considering I moved into a new home, so have been using Amazon quite a lot. Customer service, which is outsourced, is mostly useless. Given I now have access to many big box retailers, who offer delivery, I am seriously considering canceling my Prime account.

There is no more review section on the product page! The only way to get to reviews now is to click the review stars at the top of the product page but it 9 times out of 10 doesn't work! Also the app is buggy when you are on the checkout screen & decide to go back to remove or add something to your cart it has glitches multiple times back to the checkout page! Also the barcode scanner is pretty much useless!

I love shopping with Amazon. However, the app is incredibly slow. The time it takes to switch through options on my phone or even open the app is tremendously slower than on my PC. Granted, my phone is now 2 years old but even when I first got it, it was still slow AF. I wish Amazon would put more time into functionality.

More and more likely gonna uninstall this app. Amazon has proven to me that they're unreliable. I was supposed to get a package on a certain day and it's telling me it's delayed in transit and its gonna be up to 5 days late even though I needed the item and I ordered it early because they've been reliable in the past and it's still going to be late for Idk what reason.. Amazon also use to have prices from low to high when u filter. Now it's just random prices scattered and the filter is useless.

Don't get me wrong. I love Amazon. The prices, shipping, Prime member perks. But I HATE the shopping app! God could it load any slower? I don't think so. It can't load anything in a timely fashion. Nothing. It frequently just shuts down for no reason and I have to restart. I have dozens of other apps on my phone. They all load up and run just fine. Not Amazon. Slow as hell. eBay, Walmart, Wish and AliExpress work just fine. Please Amazon, fix your app. Love ya

Amazon is terrible. Horrible customer service. We were better off with stores and more choices. Prepare to blow wads of time to fix issues, getting inferior products, and inflating prices, from Amazon's 'favored nations' clause with merchant/seller accounts. Prime is a rip off, expedited shipping times are now gone, and Amazon now requires purchasing items in bulk to ship them. Also, if you get a defective item, there is no way to 'replace' them. Also, everything is knockoffs from China, cheap.

I've been an Amazon Prime member for years now. Despite the fact that the app constantly crashes (or slows down) I've always enjoyed being part of it. But with the recent updates, I am unable to take a screenshot of the app. I am unsure what was the purpose of this. It's just become so frustrating that I consider not using the app at all. Please, let the users take their screenshots, it's way more convenient like that.

Filter options are horrible, can't truly filter options for needs. It says over 20,000 results for specific item search, can only actually view about 1,000 of those before it says "end of search". Can't see my cart, just keeps showing me "deal of the day" when I click the tab to view cart. Quality control has really taken a dive as well when it comes to products ordered. It is getting harder and harder to purchase things online because you never know what you're getting anymore.

I swear that this app just devours all of the available memory on my brand new Moto Stylus 5G running Android 12. Every time I launch it, background processes are killed even if I only have a few apps open. For example, Spotify stops playing even downloaded content and my GPS tracker stops tracking. When I go back to the tracker app it reports that it was killed by the OS despite the fact that I have battery optimization disabled for it, GPS, and related services.

Not good. It charges my card way late so it is always a worry of if I have money when they decide to charge me. That as well as I wasn't allowed to cancel an order not even 10 minutes after I placed it. WHY GIVE CANCELLING AN OPTION IF I CAN'T DO IT. And it takes so long for things to deliver to me. If you want a cheaper and easier faster way to get the things you want, shop on Mercari

An item, which price and seller is always changing, had a good sales price. It's $40 regular and $24 on sale. I ordered it, and it says it wouldn't arrive until the end of January. Now I'm trying to cancel it to buy it off the official website but Amazon has me deadlocked because when I try to cancel it, it refreshes the cancel page on the app and has me stuck in a loop.

For swiss People, it's almost impossible to send something back. I wanted to return two dresses and it didn't have a barcode to do it. In addition, I must send a dress to China and pay it myself. It is very expensive. In the app, it doesn't show from where something is and this is very annoying. I didn't now that the dress was from China. Furthermore, the app is unclear to use. Wouldn't recommend it.

Very easy to purchase things, maybe too easy. They have one unfixed bug, the lists appear to have old products in them when I try and save a product to it, even when the list is empty. They also could allow users to permanently decline suggested products, this is especially helpful when an inappropriate product is suggested. Otherwise, my favorite way to spend extra money.

The app works very good for me. I see and get everything I desire - well not all things... I have a long distance relationship and it very difficult for me to find something that ships to my partners address. This wasn't a problem a couple months ago and it has only startedabout two months ago. I don't know why it's doing this. Also, sometimes when I click on merchandise that doesn't have the red print (which says you can't ship to this address,) it shows up after about 5 seconds. Please help.

One of the features that was hugely beneficial is now gone. Being able to send a self made care package to my kids, in one package instead of several was worth the prime membership, as they are only allowed 2 packages there in a certain time frame, now I can not get them everything they need. It is back to the other apps and services, unfortunately. I enjoyed the variety here, but it doesn't work for me now.

Laggiest buggiest app ever especially for a multibillion dollar megacorporation. Cheap. Shameful. Its so badly organized they had to make shortcut popups for basic things like orders after what I imagine was thousands of complaints. Just tried to load my message center and it looks like a desktop... Cant see messages meant for a computer screen on my phone. Cheap and shameful.

It's configured for English, but keeps displaying everything in French. Then I finally manage to fix it somehow. But when I click an Amazon link in Google search results it freaking reverts back to french. But configuration still says English. The browser Amazon.ca is configured in French though. I can fix that, but it does nothing for the app.

Con artists and thieves! I have Amazon Prime because of the free shipping and free returns. On the site/app, when you click on the details for the free returns, it clearly says you will NEVER be charged for return shipping if the item is new and unused. Yet EVERY time I try to return something, they want to charge me $8 in return shipping and tell me there's nothing they can do about it! Charging for returns is NOT free returns! False advertising and fraud and I am pissed!

This app needs work. The lagging, the crashing, and the "return to home" screen popping upüôÑ. I'll get random notification that things I've ordered months ago are being delivered even though they were delivered months ago. Get it together. This is a multi billionaire dollar company and it can't even load my orders? It is SO MUCH WORSE around any holiday. It sucks because of how popular this app is but at the same time that's what makes it suck.

I wish could rate zero stars. im so frustrated with amazon I could scream. Whenever I order on this app, it opens in my browser (so why bother with the app) and has charged me twice and sent duplicates of everything I order. I placed an order with two day shipping two weeks ago, the seller wont respond to my emails or pick up their phone. Id may as well cancell my orders and just go to a store. Waste of time.

A "Middle of the Shopping Aisle" App, at best. I've experienced positive and negative sessions with Amazon Shopping over the past two years. However, the sudden inability to open over other apps when used to open a link, the constant background refreshing, and the terrible drain on my mobile's battery are proving to be deal breakers. Hopefully, Amazon will eventually tinker towards producing a more User (and Mobile) Friendly experience. But, until then I must say goodbye and good luck, my dears!

‚ö†Ô∏èCAN'T UNINSTALL & NO WARNING‚ö†Ô∏è Tried this app vs website & I don't personally like it. I can: disable, force stop, and "clear" storage & cache, but it's still lurking & using space. Unsurprisingly, "clear storage" is NOT a permanent feature; close your settings app and this app literally shows identical space used when you immediately reopen settings (with the ever-helpful "clear storage" button reactivated). üôÑ üì¢ Shame on you Google! Faustian Bargains never work.

The Amazon Shopping App is Slower Than a Tortoise. I practically lived on the Amazon app (as a many years Prime member). Now the app is completely unresponsive! I can't check orders status, it crashes regularly, irrelevant products are presented to my searches and I have to slog through commercially-biased junk to try to find potentially purchasable merch. Perhaps Mr Bezos should get re-involved to restore the reputation and operations functions of the Amazon brand... This app is now useless.

I've been waiting a week for 2 of my items to arrive when I pay for free 2 day shipping. Not working with me at all this close to Christmas with it either. Told me my items will be canceled & to wait 5 days for a refund! I don't have a lot of money so now idk what I'll do about replacing those. They can't cancel items already shipped when you want them canceled but they can do it in matters like this. Canceling prime

If we are paying for delivery them stop using the postal service. They don't like to deliver heavy cat food bags. Also if I'm signed into the app on my phone and Amazon is the one stopping me from being able to buy certain things from the app. Don't make me have to do a song and dance to sign in on browser. Post a link so we can easily go to the browser and then buy it. It almost feels like Amazon doesn't want me to buy certain things from them and wants me to buy them elsewhere.

Something is wrong with this app. Prior I had never has an issue with freezing or checking my order history. Now it's impossible to check my orders and track I have to go the the main website to see it. When I want something quick I find myself just googling it and going to the sellers website or just using the Amazon website and not the app. Very frustrating. What happened Amazon???

Honestly amazon is more than greedy, they constantly send emails to remind you about your shopping cart, trending items, items you are 'recommended' to purchase etc. It's geniuenly annoying and leaves me with the feeling of wanting to punch someone. Also, the search engine is very outdated. There's far less popular shopping companies that do a much better job of helping you to look for something specifically and fast. On Amazon you gotta scroll for hours and it often doesn't even show you stuff.

Really annoying to try and use. Takes forever to load when switching between different colors of the same item on an item's page. Took away the reviews section at the bottom so have to tap on the stars to get to the review page but 80% of the time won't open anything so can't see any reviews. When trying to print return labels from email it reroutes to the app (forcing me to have to sign back in) to then just automatically download the label, instead of just downloading via email app or Google.

I don't really care for their new payment processing procedure. When Amazon was at its peak, in my opinion, when you submitted payment, the payment amount was removed from your account immediately. Now, I feel the payment comes out whenever they take it out. Sometimes, say, you order 3 items. One day, payment for one of those items is removed, and 2 weeks later the remaining payment for the other 2 items are removed. Go back to your original payment procedure. This new one is shady.

I hate that everytime I buy something the money is taking from my account the day I place my order. Then the money is returned and taken out again once the package finally ships. This is a messed up system. I'm always short in my account as I see things taken out and assume my bank account is correct then I check a week later and I have no money. Please change it so people are charged the first time and no swapping around. Amazon should hold the money until the seller in ready to receive it.

Has become impossible to search for items. Search an item on the website, instantly come up or in the top 5, search the same item (even copy-paste the name) in the app, and the item doesn't appear. Tried searching in the settings to see if there was something different, I couldn't see if there was a setting that was different. Please update the app catalog as it is clearly missing items

Generally the app is good albeit some finer filters to find products would be helpful but not the end of the world. Only real gripe is with Amazon Prime delivery drivers. Yes they are quick to deliver which is fantastic and useful but frustratingly every so often to see deliveries marked as handed to resident when no such event happened and likewise delivered to wrong addresses is annoying. This evening I've had to canvass my neighbourhood to find my parcel.

It may be great to just have whatever shipped to you, but they are completely clueless on how to make the purchase process easy. The payments don't come out right away, but say pending and then don't even get charged when you thought your items were all set and ready to ship. Then they try to sneak extra charges in. I'm sick of these losers taking advantage of people.

Amazon used to be a lot better. Now I can't even disable certain notifications without disabling them all, including delivery notifications. Furthermore if you disable them they will stop donating through Amazon smile. And in the last few years I have gotten double the broken deliveries, wrong deliveries, stuff missing due to misdeliveries, expired or miscounted food items, late deliveries, randomly canceled deliveries, and just about every other annoying thing you can imagine for online orders.

I do a lot of my shopping via Amazon, especially at Christmas time but recently I've found this app to be really sluggish. I've been putting items in my basket then going back less than 5 minutes later to finish my order to find that my basket is now empty so I have to start all over again. This is really annoying, especially as it keeps emptying my basket constantly before I can complete and finish an order. I've uninstalled and reinstalled the app but still no better. Please sort it out Amazon

This app has become slower than molasses flowing uphill in January. Always timing out. Timing out before products can be added to cart. Telling you things haven't been added and then finding out there is actually 2 or 3 that are in there. This app used to be fast and work perfectly. Now I just go to Walmart and get stuff instead of dealing with this frustrating app. Go back to the way it was. Sometimes newer isn't better

This app is terrible. I was trying to pay my prime membership fee but it wouldn't let me do it. It kept giving me the message that the fee was owed but kept flashing the same notification over and over again. It use to be a really great app not sure what happened but I'm unistalling it cause now I have to login on my laptop. Downloading this app was to provide me with the convenience of purchasing items and accessing my account via mobile phone. Oh wellI guess it was good while it lasted.

Where else do you get a sturdy selection of movies, music, gaming items, and shipping for a few dollars a month(1/2 price for EBT recipients). Then they invite you to make $10+ in store credit every month for scanning in 10 receipts. It pays for my membership with $ left over. And no one sqwaks when half your relatives use your account creds on 18 different devices. Good deal.

Every time I open the mobile app on Android I get a message about not being able to sign up for prime on my phone (I'm already a prime user) and the search bar has disappeared from the main landing screen. So I have no way of trying to find what I need. I emailed them about this a week ago and still no fix. It's stopping me shopping on Amazon!

This app killed my Christmas shopping experience, I had placed an order on the 7th with express shipping. I monitored the item waiting for the shipped status to show. Not only did it not ship, it has been totally wiped from any type of existence in my history and orders placed. I wasnt charged at least. Now to put in extra time out on foot with time I didn't have in the fort place. Waste my time not once, but twice! All I'll say is support local business before considering this app pls!

I've been a PRIME member for years so it's sad to see it fall apart like this. Right before Christmas they have decided it now takes UP to SIX MONTHS to be refunded on a return even if you have the the drop off receipt. PRIME used to be two day shipping and fast returns. Now we get penalized if the truck doesn't go to the right warehouse or it gets lost. Amazon was the last mainstream thing I used. Canceled Amazon I'm only shopping local. Walmart is hassle free with a receipt, and no waiting.

all I got to say is.... I. LOVE. AMAZON. they are a lifesaver....‚ù§ Update: starting to dislike app a whole lot!! 1st the app keeps auto switching to Spanish, I have done everything I can find to keep it in English, I have Uninstalled app at least 5x now and reinstalled, chkd my preferences etc.... still switches to Spanish. All my notication msgs in app a d to my Gmail keep coming in Spanish, unfortunately can't read themüò°üò°ü§∑‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è and you can't get a REAL PERSON to help me!! I'm do frustrated!!

I'm about to lose it with this company!! Every single time I click to see my orders, it tries to load, but nothing comes through. Once in a blue, whenever it wants, it lets you see your orders. Because of this, they make it impossible to even return an item. I dont have time for this!!!! This been going on for 2 years, and they still haven't fixed it. I had enough!!!

Edit to add; please check your accounts. Several sellers have charged me multiple times for same order. Customer service that lies to appease customers and never follow through after you spend a half hour just trying to get through to them. I've been a prime member for years and I'm done. Never again. They won't fix my account and I'm done risking it while I pay for perks I'm not even getting. Done! There are much better shopping sites without the games they're playing.

Amazon recently removed "Notifications categories" from their app. So instead of only getting notifications about the purchases I've made and when they'll be delivered, I get tons of ads I care absolutely nothing about. If I want to stop receiving these ads, I'll have to stop receiving notifications about my shipments. Bring back notifications categories, and I'll restore my rating to something more appropriate.

Order from Amazon and 50% of the time items don't show up, for whatever reasons, lost, stolen or what they like to call an "order processing error" whatever that is. Amazon isn't interested in helping with any issues, customer service has zero answers when asked. What they see on their computer isn't what shows on my app and nothing gets done or answered. I have been hung up on by customer service with the excuse there were "technical issues". Their customer service is a joke. Shop local.

I could program this app better... This app is good for browsing the next thing you want to buy and to have a quick look on your lists, if your wifi router is made of gold, else you can wait a little long, but thats not the problem. I just have one question, how can this app not at least have half of the program for the pc, whilst taking nearly double its power, also adding that this is a app, i can open amazon on a browser on my oldest pc and it runs faster also there is no working orders list

I'm not sure why this is happening but everytime I go to open the app it just buffers. All you can see is a header and a white screen. You have to restart the phone to use the app. I have unlimited and reinstall it only to have it work a couple of days and goes right back to white screen. Oh and it's not only happening on my phone.

I maintain two accounts on Amazon. One is a prime member. I constantly encounter amazon offering the prime account the same item at 1-2$ more than the free account ( Same Item/Same Seller). More common when the free account finds an item under the 25$ free shipping threshold. I can get the item at the best price if I add the item to the cart while in incognito then signing in to prime account at checkout.

Utter rubbish. Seems to work completely independently of the website, the TV app, or anything else connected with Amazon. Does not link to normal web links, definitely doesn't work with anything payment related. Gave up trying to order a film through this and used a normal website instead. Sorted in two minutes.

Horrible. First order they charged my card more than what was shown when finalising payment. Took 2 days of chatting and having to explain the issue to at least 6 different people then finally getting a credit when I was on the phone for 30min. Only given a credit, so no I have to buy more from Amazon to get the $ they overcharged. Horrid experience.

I've been using Amazon for years. The thing that Amazon really is bad at is taking any kind of payments whether that be from the Amazon card or just a typical bank card. If the system messes up, they won't even take accountability for it. Customer service is awful, 20 minutes on the phone with them, and they accomplished absolutely nothing. It won't let me put zero stars, so 0/10 wouldn't recommend.

Amazon is going downhill pretty fast. I'm basing my review on the last few purchases that I've made. Items never arrive.. or they arrive weeks later. Missing the occasion that your perchase was intended for..I t's hard to get in touch with a carrier if the item is not delivered by Amazon. There are plenty of other more qualified shopping apps out there. Where you're givin a delivery date and it actually comes before, or on the delivery date. Start exploring other options everybody.
